description:
The curtain rises on VAZZROCK Live: Flawless, the grand concert celebrating the 4th anniversary of the VAZZROCK project.
The twelve members of VAZZY and ROCK DOWN have waited for this day with bated breath. Passionate cheers from the audience fill the stadium and resonate backstage and beyond.
The "one-year" adventure for these shining stars continues on...
Source: crunchyroll
